## Description {#details}

The Vector <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> Database.

Helper class used to find the vector functions associated to a scalar <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a>.

Definition at line 31 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/vectorutils-h">VectorUtils.h</a>.
